content: > **this pattern can be found for free > with ads on my blog and youtube > channel but in one size only pdf > version of this pattern includes one > additional size ** written pattern ** here 1 ** video tutorial ** here 2 ** pdf pattern on etsy ** here 3 ** > buy 3 patterns or more and get 20% off > on the entire purchase no coupon is > needed happy crocheting this is a listing of a crochet headband pattern - blueberry dance **sizes ** newborn baby toddler child teen and adult **materials ** aran weight yarn 4 5 mm crochet hook a pair of scissors stitch marker a yarn needle and a measuring tape **stitches ** chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet **number of pages in pdf ** 3 **in the pdf ** written instructions step-by-step photo tutorial links to the specific parts in the video tutorial **language ** english **crochet terms ** us crochet terms **skill level ** easy the price is for the pattern/tutorial/pdf only not the finished product * **returns** please contact me if you have any questions before you make a purchase there are no returns on digital files this pattern is the property of croby patterns and is for your personal use only you can not modify sell or share this pattern text and images copyright c 2021 by croby patterns all rights reserved 1 http //crobypatterns com/free-pattern-super-easy-crochet-headband/ 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=wcksbriksjm 3 https //goo gl/xzxkjr
